message: tell people to use convoke :D
Is there any live streaming like djangocon?
leah
convore i mean
unfortunately i don't think there is
no cameras on the room
Sad. Hard to be there back in Iowa :(.
No cameras? I thought this was being recorded.
If anyone has any issues or concerns, please either stop by the AV booth or ask one of the staff in the (crazy) bright blue shirts.
@pydanny I hope so!
Welcome to Miami Pythonistas!  Believe it or not, there's a thriving tech community in South Florida.  Check out one of our events calendar: http://miamitechevents.com/
Does that mean I can get really crazy in my talk? :)
